reviewText: Perfect
My 2yr grandson Noah loves Peppa Pig! Anything & Everything Peppa Pig! You'll love it too! :)
Daughter absolutely loves it. Couldn't be happier.
Small children love Peppa.  It is a great gift for children age 1 to 3 years.  Innocent, decent, creative and fun.
Peppa pig is always fun to watch, it is a bit different from the typical cartoon, but always fun and safe humor.
hi I Love dvds okay

Its time for some more fun with our favorite cheeky little pig and her family! Peppa Pig Cold Winter Day is out today and its just the thing to cozy up and watch as the temperatures drop!

My kids regularly watch the show on Nick Jr but it never fails that as soon as it ends they ask for another. Thats why a DVD with ten Peppasodes is the perfect thing!

Since my older kids are 6 and 7 and this show is designed for pre-schoolers I keep waiting for them to outgrow Peppa but apparently her humor just continues to entertain them. My one year old watches with them and they all laugh at the snorts together.

The Cold Winter Day is exactly what it sounds like and got my kids talking about winter and wanting to build a snowman. That proves to be difficult in Southern California but ironically, today on the release of this new DVD it is quite frigid here!

If you have Peppa Pig fans, they will be entertained by this collection of ten Peppasodes and will get them in the mood for some winter fun!

Peppasodes Include
1. Cold Winter Day
2. Not Very Well
3. Snow
4. Thunderstorm
5. The Sleep Princess
6. Bedtime
7. Swimming
8. Daddy Pigs Office
9. Ice Skating
10. The Toy Cupboard
My grandkids all love Peppa Pig, they can watch these episodes over and over (3,5 and 7 yrs. old) and I love that there is nothing in them for me to worry about exposing them to.
My two daughters LOVE watching Peppa Pig on youtube, they are extremely happy to have their own DVD's so they can watch it in their bedroom and play with their toys!
WE HAVE ALL OF THE PEPPA PIG DVD'S, AND LOVE EVERY SINGLE ONE. THEY ARE SWEET, TEACH LIFE LESSONS, AND ARE ENTERTAINING!
